bow: target therapy why is just walking the aisles of target so refreshing don feel like this at any other store is it the way they arrange things the smell combination my husband gets upset with me because anytime we get target gift card spend it all instantly think ve reached peak mom target is my on the verge of meltdown and need to be left alone for two hours escape messy bun yoga pants starbucks and just roaming it amazing yes and mine had starbucks need diapers ll go grab chai meander and let the stress melt off at least until see my total at checkout haha used to go every day with baby during nap time because she would sleep the whole time truly magical it an environment and atmosphere they culture the team members employees are trained to be helpful but not pushy each store is laid out similarly and in an easy to navigate way there is no grating music in the background it refreshed regularly with new products they work really hard to create specific feeling for the shoppers worked there for few weeks and it was honestly really nice just super chill this might be the best mom advice ve ever received unintentionally im redoing my plans for today when was on maternity leave and it was too cold for outside walks used to just put my little one in the stroller and aimlessly wander the target aisles in the early mornings it was wonderful remember as child shopping at kmart always made me feel uneasy like the lighting was off it hard to describe target is the opposite feeling about to do that very thing don get it either no other store makes me feel that content im going later too haha its the need to get out of the house but dont want to go anywhere outside or super far want to walk but not get tired hot or thirsty may actually need to get something for the house and they prob have it and thank goodness came in bc totally forgot we were out of that too place target is amazing love wandering around and looking at everything my daughter loves target now too when was pregnant and would start having contractions would go walk target to try to get it moving along it was january and could walk outside it was nice to walk around and hope the contractions would take off though labor did happen at target tried lol same think some quality corporate psychology has gone on behind the scenes recently they remodelled some local targets and was ready to hate the new set up but still get that mellow relaxed feeling think there are couple things they do differently than other stores like wal mart better sound proofing so it always feels quiet and calm warmer colors and more comfortable overhead lights as opposed to the high contrast of wal mart with simultaneously dim and harsh flourescent unobtrusive but easily identifiable workers floor is easier to walk on not straight up concrete starbucks would plan appointments like bank doctors around nap time so little one would be asleep and could actually hold adult conversations it was great think also their lighting makes difference it feels friendlier than walmart the starbucks the clean bathrooms the candle aisle zen think you just planned my saturday for me live like 45 minutes from the nearest target so when go it like whole day trip ugh to total have the off debit card and clearly need to eat better at math because my discount is never as much as think hope it will be in the evening when my husband is putting our toddler to bed will sometimes sneak off to target or meijer or lowe we call those trips vacation fill in the blank with whichever store it is don usually shop it just the luxury of slow kid less walk removed go with my toddler it never crazy crowded to where he can walk around the carts are clean if he wants to sit in one they have coffee their up amp up brand diaper wipes have always been good price my son had problem with car rides for so long and target is minute drive he fine with the car now but he still wants to go to the circle store instead of even the park sometimes yes do the same it really is thing sometimes go and at the last minute buy something because have this unnerving feeling that they will think staking out the pace to rob them maybe they should have an apron available to us moms to wear even be happy to wear the apron and be known as shopper who knows where everything is located and help other customers in need wouldn mind donating this service to store that brings me feeling of peace aisles are also more spaced out and everything is just more organized and clean things also usually have easy to find price tags spot on with the lack of horrible music hadn noticed that before was in small shop today and the sales guy was trying to make small talk with me at check out honestly couldn even focus on the conversation because was so desperate for him to hurry up and finish so could get away from godawful knockoff christmas song playing loudly in the store the lighting and the ugly gray cement floors are what made the atmosphere at kmart and shopko unpleasant when was kid also walmart now and the shopping carts roll like butter the target closest to me has the nastiest bathrooms they re literally the worst public bathrooms ve ever been in same actually work at target now so while it not super therapeutic anymore find myself thinking oh should buy this later while working on the floor this is so dangerous because my husband loves target too literally our first date involved target don even think we bought anything but we had to go together we get paid or we re bored or we re trying to make plans it hey let go to target😂 depending on where you live is basically getting discount on sales tax complain to corporate they take that shit seriously feel like target is cleaner too walmart always makes me uncomfortable even if they have similar things and they re more quiet they also do have overhead announcements which makes the whole experience feel more upscale was with you til the bit about the gift card go there just to push around those magically smooth carts and browse the pretty things but somehow do ever feel like need to buy anything there the experience itself is so refreshing very true good point same an hour away totally agree but live in canada so they have taken my therapy away wandering lost make do with starbucks in chapters and an annual sisters weekend to the states to get our fix enjoy one for me this weekend everyone this was my morning it was glorious it varies store by store but some are adding music my kids are older when they are going stir crazy we pack up and head to target they mouth breathe in the toy aisle or video game section they are well behaved so don worry about leaving them alone for few minutes roam the store and put things don need in my cart win win for everyone love me some target but can walk in there for one thing and leave with 15 target is my therapist when can get for an appointment with her it called the target effect https people com home target effect meaning scientific reasoning cant only buy one thing this speaks to me on so many levels when was pregnant and my cousins were giving me advice the one that stuck with me the most was you re going to need break when your husband comes home from work you re not going to want to be away from your baby but let him give you break trust me it will make difference it for your sanity me went to target worked there in college so did have that feeling for long time but after being mom became target convert again there are some really funny internet target things out there recommend looking up the target engagement shoot it cracked me up mom level 9000 yay 90 minutes one direction and border lineup to get my target fix go after dinner tell them going to the target mom party no kids allowed removed same was so surprised shocked when used their bathroom recently it was the most anti target brand experience same then moved to australia and kmart here is like target even prettier sister it bizarre it so organized and clean get you my husband and both took turns roaming target when kiddo was brand new it mins away and we needed something plus break don know why it so good but it is get it my three year old told his dad his favorite thing to do is spend money with mom at the target love target and am raising the next generation to carry the torch proudly for sure worked as the front end lead it was huge issue if the bathrooms were dirty if we couldn get someone in for the check we get an alert to clean the bathrooms every hours id have to do it myself you know what messed up had my first baby weeks ago you know when started choosing to go to target weeks ago when was finally ready to get out of the house lmao why is target must for mom life my
